--- layout: component title: Breadcrumb description: A breadcrumb trail is a type of secondary navigation scheme that reveals the userâ€™s location in a website or Web application. Since this component is designed to show users how to navigate back up the site hierarchy, it is unnecessary to show it on the home page of a website or application. guidelines: do: - Begin with a link to the home page and end with the name of the current page - Place at the top of the page, between the global navigation and the page title - Use consistently throughout the site or app - Use on down-level pages - Apply the ellipsis dropdown pattern when the links are too long to display on a single line dont: - Use in place of global navigation - Use inside another component like a modal, dialog or sidebar contents: - Usage guidelines - Basic Breadcrumb - Collapsed links ---
